response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed and developed to cater to your needs. This product comes with cutting-edge features and unparalleled performance, making it an invaluable asset. Considering its exceptional quality and capabilities, we're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $7,500. This exclusive opportunity won't last long, so I encourage you to consider this offer carefully. Should you have any questions or need more information, please feel free to reach out. Looking forward to serving you!", "product_price": 7500}
